binding:binding.name: Honeywell MyTotalConnectComfort Thermostat Binding
binding:binding.description: Controls Honeywell Thermostats from openHAB that are managed via the Honeywell MyTotalConnectComfort web site. Requires internet connection and Honeywell account. Tested with Honeywell TH9320WF5003 US Model, but other models that use the mytotalconnectcomfort.com site may be supported.
binding:binding.author: Jeremy Freedman
